org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.metrics

Class AbstractMetric<X,G,U>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.metrics.AbstractMetric<X,G,U>
  • Type Parameters:
    X - The context type.
    U - The type of per-user results. This is a plain Java class that has fields or methods annotated with ResultColumn containing the per-user output columns.
    G - The type of global results. This is a plain Java class that has fields or methods annotated with ResultColumn containing the aggregate output columns.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, Metric<X>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoveragePredictMetric, EntropyPredictMetric, HLUtilityPredictMetric, IndependentRecallTopNMetric, MAEPredictMetric, MRRTopNMetric, NDCGPredictMetric, NDCGTopNMetric, OutputPredictMetric, OutputTopNMetric, PrecisionRecallTopNMetric, RMSEPredictMetric, TopNEntropyMetric, TopNLengthMetric, TopNPopularityMetric

    public abstract class AbstractMetric<X,G,U>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Metric<X>
    A simple metric base class that tracks the current evaluation.
    Since:
    0.10

      • getPrefix

        protected java.lang.String getPrefix()
        A prefix to be applied to column names. If non-null, this prefix will be applied and separated with a period.
        Returns:
        The prefix to apply to column names.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Close the metric. Many metrics do not need to be closed, so this implementation is a no-op.
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.io.Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error closing the metric.
